mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_AD_MALL_SETTING (CND_FREE_DLV_AMT , DLV_CST, REG_DTS) VALUES (REPLACE(TO_CHAR(#{cnd_free_dlv_amt}), ',' ,''), REPLACE(TO_CHAR(#{dlv_cst}), ',' ,''), SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_AD_MALL_SETTING SET CND_FREE_DLV_AMT = REPLACE( TO_CHAR(#{cnd_free_dlv_amt}), ',' ,'') ,DLV_CST = REPLACE( TO_CHAR(#{dlv_cst}), ',' ,'') ,UPD_DTS = SYSDATE
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_GRD_NO ,GRD_NM ,DC_AMT ,PNT_RSV_RT ,REGR_NO ,REG_DTS ,UPDR_NO ,UPD_DTS ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM TBL_AD_USER WHERE USER_NO = TBL_ME_GRD.UPDR_NO) REG_USER_NM FROM TBL_ME_GRD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ME_GRD (MEM_GRD_NO , GRD_NM, DC_AMT,PNT_RSV_RT,REGR_NO,REG_DTS) VALUES (SEQ_ME_GRD.NEXTVAL ,#{grd_nm} ,REPLACE(#{dc_amt}, ',' ,'') ,REPLACE(#{pnt_rsv_rt}, ',' ,'') ,#{regr_no} , SYSDATE)
